notes.text:
This update for mercurial fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2019-3902: Fixed incorrect patch-checking with symlinks and subrepos (bsc#1133035).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: A flaw was found in Mercurial before 4.9. It was possible to use symlinks and subrepositories to defeat Mercurial's path-checking logic and write files outside a repository.
notes.title: CVE description
